mapper.update: update company_contract_flow set staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_field = #{templateField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_signed_url = #{contractSignedUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_signed_pic_url = #{contractSignedPicUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_signed_path = #{contractSignedPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_date = #{contractDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, client_name = #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where flow_id = #{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select flow_id, staff_id, template_id, template_field, contract_signed_url, contract_signed_pic_url, contract_signed_path, contract_date, client_name from company_contract_flow where flow_id = #{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
